column4: i've downloaded bittorrent and gui... it does not show up in the menu.. how do i find it?
oh... like that? different from win
i try it now....
bittorrent?
just save it and open with your torrent client
i've saved it... i've installed bittorrent... how do i open with the torrent client? how do i find it?
where is FF set to save downloads?
the the torrent should be there
yes... but it open with democracyplayer... where is the bittorent?
which client are u using?
i've just installed bittorrent... but when i open the torrent file... it uses the democracyplayer....
right click torrent and open with bittorrent
yeah... it works... how do i associate the torrent file with bittorrent instead of democracyplayer?
right click properties - "open with"
how do i associate it permanently instead of right clicking all the time? just double click?
if you do what i said before it will be accociated with bittorrent
i did what u said... it is still associated with democracyplayer when i double click
right click ,properties ,open with, tick bittorrent
how do i tick bittorent?
right click ,properties ,open with, add , find bittorrent ,tick bittorrent
found it.... i have to rightclick select properties... then openwith....
thanks...
